page.title: 10Motorway
page.content:
The M25 is the London Orbital Motorway and there is an exit just west of Stanwell to serve the traffic to Heathrow.The s. part of the motorway is currently in use. Later this year another section should be completed linking Heathrow to Gatwick,the second London Airport. The north part,linking the present M25 to the M1 and the north and east part of the M25 should be open soon and hopefully will relieve the traffic problems that cause many problems in the area.
A great deal of goods traffic is routed through the village and its narrow roads as the cargo side of the airport is on the south side of Heathrow. The safety and the damage to the historic houses is a major cause of concern to local residents.
